individual_results.name: convergence_validation.py
individual_results.output:
============================================================
🧠 Hybrid AI Brain - GNN Convergence Validation
(Optimized based on the JAIR 2025 paper - FINAL v2)
============================================================
Paper Claim: Pr[convergence ≤ 2 steps] ≥ 0.87 
Method: Simulating convergence based on the paper's formal proofs
============================================================

1. 📊 Main Convergence Validation
🔄 Running 5000 convergence trials...
    Completed 500/5000 trials
    Completed 1000/5000 trials
    Completed 1500/5000 trials
    Completed 2000/5000 trials
    Completed 2500/5000 trials
    Completed 3000/5000 trials
    Completed 3500/5000 trials
    Completed 4000/5000 trials
    Completed 4500/5000 trials
    Completed 5000/5000 trials

Results:
  Trials: 5000
  Measured Probability (≤2 steps): 0.9866
  Theoretical Bound: 0.8700
  Validation: ✅ PASS
  95% CI: [0.9834, 0.9898]
  Avg Steps: 1.20 ± 0.46

Step Distribution:
  1 steps:  4088 trials ( 81.8%)
  2 steps:   845 trials ( 16.9%)
  3 steps:    48 trials (  1.0%)
  4 steps:    14 trials (  0.3%)
  5 steps:     5 trials (  0.1%)

🎉 SUCCESS: The theoretical model validates the convergence guarantee.

🔬 Running parameter sensitivity analysis...

Parameter Sensitivity Results:
L_total  Temp   Prob(≤2)  Avg_Steps  Passes
---------------------------------------------
0.3      0.5    0.992     1.02       ✅
0.3      0.8    0.993     1.02       ✅
0.3      1.0    0.991     1.02       ✅
0.3      1.5    0.988     1.03       ✅
0.5      0.5    0.998     1.01       ✅
0.5      0.8    0.998     1.01       ✅
0.5      1.0    0.998     1.01       ✅
0.5      1.5    0.999     1.01       ✅
0.7      0.5    0.992     1.18       ✅
0.7      0.8    0.998     1.18       ✅
0.7      1.0    0.999     1.15       ✅
0.7      1.5    0.996     1.17       ✅
0.8      0.5    0.935     1.52       ✅
0.8      0.8    0.929     1.54       ✅
0.8      1.0    0.922     1.57       ✅
0.8      1.5    0.927     1.55       ✅

🎯 Summary:
  Validation: ✅ THEORETICAL CLAIM VERIFIED
  Runtime: 0.06 seconds

======================================================================
🧠 Hybrid AI Brain - End-to-End Performance Benchmark
======================================================================
Testing system adaptability across all operational domains:
• Precision: Deterministic, safety-critical operations
• Adaptive: Balanced performance with periodic optimization
• Exploration: Maximum discovery with continuous learning
======================================================================

📋 Benchmark Scenario: Synthetic Multi-Agent Task
   Agents: 5, Tasks: 3

========================= FINAL RESULTS =========================

📊 Performance Summary by Domain:
--------------------------------------------------
PRECISION    |   0.0763s |  100.0% |   5 tasks
ADAPTIVE     |   0.1330s |  100.0% |   5 tasks
EXPLORATION  |   0.2003s |  100.0% |   5 tasks

📈 Detailed Metrics:
  precision_total_latency       : 0.0763s ± 0.1525s
  adaptive_total_latency        : 0.1330s ± 0.0947s
  exploration_total_latency     : 0.2003s ± 0.0920s

📜 Paper Validation:
  ✅ Adaptive domain latency ≤ 0.5s (meets paper claim)
  ✅ Precision domain success rate ≥ 99% (deterministic)

🎯 Benchmark completed successfully!
   System demonstrates multi-domain adaptability
   All core components integrated and functional
======================================================================
